humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that two out of twelve lymph nodes are positive for carcinoma (2/11). This corresponds to the N1 stage based on the AJCC staging system, as per New Rule 12: N1 indicates metastases in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes (No/Total).

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The N stage for this patient is pN1a, which is supported by the finding of two out of eleven lymph nodes (2/11) positive for carcinoma. The substaging information (N1a, N1b, N1c) is not considered in this case.
